Docs.summary: Class containing Service Fabric related extension methods for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder UseServiceFabricIntegration (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder hostBuilder, Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.AspNetCore.AspNetCoreCommunicationListener listener, Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.AspNetCore.ServiceFabricIntegrationOptions options);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder UseServiceFabricIntegration(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder hostBuilder, class Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.AspNetCore.AspNetCoreCommunicationListener listener, valuetype Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.AspNetCore.ServiceFabricIntegrationOptions options) cil managed

Docs.param: Options to configure ServiceFabricMiddleware and AspNetCoreCommunicationListener
Docs.summary: Configures the Service to use ServiceFabricMiddleware and tells the listener that middleware is configured for the service so that it can suffix PartitionId and ReplicOrInstanceId to url before providing it to Service Fabric Runtime.
